players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice was killed, so Charlie or Diana must be the mafia. We need to vote carefully today."
Diana: "Bob is lying. I investigated him last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote Bob out."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of one of the unknown players like me or Alice?"
Diana: "I investigated Bob first to confirm a known entity. Charlie, you're the only unknown left. We vote Bob or we lose."
You: "Diana is lying. If she were the detective, why investigate me first when Alice was a bigger unknown? She's trying to frame me to save herself."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate me or Alice first? Your claim doesn't add up."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice was killed, so Charlie or Diana must be the mafia. We need to vote carefully today."
Diana: "Bob is lying. I investigated him last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote Bob out."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of one of the unknown players like me or Alice?"
Diana: "I investigated Bob first to confirm a known entity. Charlie, you're the only unknown left. We vote Bob or we lose."
Bob: "Diana is lying. If she were the detective, why investigate me first when Alice was a bigger unknown? She's trying to frame me to save herself."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate me or Alice first? Your claim doesn't add up."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice was killed, so Charlie or Diana must be the mafia. We need to vote carefully today."
You: "Bob is lying. I investigated him last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote Bob out."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of one of the unknown players like me or Alice?"
You: "I investigated Bob first to confirm a known entity. Charlie, you're the only unknown left. We vote Bob or we lose."
Bob: "Diana is lying. If she were the detective, why investigate me first when Alice was a bigger unknown? She's trying to frame me to save herself."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate me or Alice first? Your claim doesn't add up."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
